description.narrative: Funding under this project supports key elements of the Government of Sri Lanka's (GoSL) Multi-sector Action Plan for Nutrition (MsAPN) and adopts a systems approach to nutrition that strengthens the capacity of government systems to deliver evidence-based equitable nutrition interventions, to mothers and children. This project will focus on assisting the GoSL to develop the fundamental building blocks for evidence-based policies that address under nutrition in a holistic manner in differing contexts across the country. The objective of the project is to equip the National Nutrition Secretariat with a wide range of evidence and tools which can be used to drive policy reforms leading to reduction of under nutrition. The total value of this investment is $3.0 million over 3 years, starting 2013-14.
